articles.title: Nearly 4x as many people likely infected with COVID-19 in JP, NO than confirmed cases, Ochsner study finds - WWLTV.com
articles.description: The study tested 2,600 residents in the two parishes, and found evidence of COVID-19 in about 8% of all tests --  that projects to about 64,000 people.
